LOG_CHANNEL.description: channel ID for the log channel where the bot will forward media messages and store these files

HOST.description: A Fully Qualified Domain Name or Heroku App URL. (eg. https://example.herokuapp.com). Update it After Deploying the Bot

HASH_LENGTH.description: Custom hash length for generated URLs. The hash length must be greater than 5 and less than or equal to 32. Default to 6

USE_SESSION_FILE.description: Use session files for worker client(s). This speeds up the worker bot startups. default to false

USER_SESSION.description: A pyrogram session string for a user bot. Used for auto adding the bots to LOG_CHANNEL. Default to null
